message.content:
I need to identify the line item and value of costs incurred to secure customer orders and to deliver the goods and services to customers from the financial statement.

Looking at the income statement, these costs would typically be categorized as "Selling Expenses" since they relate to securing customer orders and delivering goods and services.

In the income statement, I can see:
```
| Selling Expenses | 309942.03 | 2024-02-05 |
```

This is the line item that represents costs incurred for securing customer orders and delivering goods/services to customers.

{"solution": {'value': '309942.03'}}
